characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If a Great Unclean One is armed with a bileblade, it can use it to hook out a portion of its own rotting guts as an offering to Nurgle each time it attempts to manifest a psychic power. If it does so, the Great Unclean One immediately suffers a mortal wound (which you may attempt to ignore due to being Disgustingly Resilient) before you take the Psychic test, but you can then add 1 to the result.
